questions.question_text: Which one of the following statements applies to a set of fields when they are coalesced during an import?

choices.B: If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the system does not create a Transform Map
choices.A: If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
choices.D: If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
choices.C: If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the system creates a new record

choices.A: It displays actions such as creating quick reports, configuring the list, and exporting data
choices.D: It displays actions such as view form, view related task, and add relationship
choices.B: It displays actions related to filtering options, assigning tags, and search
choices.C: It displays actions related to viewing and filtering the entire list

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Column Context Menus a.k.a Column Options – found on the header of each field (the 3 dots on the left of field header)
B – Assigning tags is on “Actions on selected rows” tab and search is the tab with magnifying glass. Both is on the top right corner.
C- This is actually true but A is more precise. So A is the answer
D – these actions are on each row/record, on the “i” (info) icon not on Column Context Menu

Selected Answer: A
A is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

questions.question_text: Which one of the following statements is true about Column Context Menus?

choices.A: A collection of subject matter experts

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D as users can be part of different teams, so a SN group can a collection of users from various teams/departments
D is correct. Page 75 of the ServiceNow Administration Fundamentals - Tokyo Edition.
